PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-10782015-07-16,  ,  ,  ,  DFO
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Marine Mammal Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MARINE MAMMAL REGULATIONS in order to increase the distance that an unlicensed observer must maintain from a person fishing for seals, except under the authority of a seal fishery observation licence, from one-half nautical mile (i.e., 926 meters) to one nautical mile (i.e., 1.852 km).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0188 Publication Date: 2015-07-29
AttachmentsAttachment
